entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
